resources.string: Quiz/vote/survey/collection/file transfer: 1.You and audiance are on same WIFI 2.Tap number to enter/announce orally /project to show questions 3.Tap +Q icon to add more questions 4. Optionally enter answers above 5.Tap Ear icon to start receiving 6.Announce this IP after it appears 7.At end,tap Stop Listening,Save icon

Quiz/vote/survey/collection/file transfer: 1.You and Enquirer are on same wifi 2.Enter your ID, and Enquirer IP 3.Listen/tap number to view questions 4.Enter answer for question, tap -> 5.To send file, tap cell, File icon 6.Send photo, tap cell, Camera icon
may have been asked orally or shown on projected screen. You may write down here
Enter your name/ID, and Enquirer short IP
Enter Name of Session if you need to save records
Choose an application to open file:
Announce to the audice/class the device IP:
Enquirer and Responsor should use the same Service Port.
The shown number is the original width. Enter the width requested by Enquirer
Ask the Enquirer for the correct IP and turn on listener
Still receiving message. Stop listening before perform desired operation

Copy paste question text to this textbox. If a question contains new line, use blank line to separate question from question. Otherwise, just use new line to separate question from question.Finishing editing, tap the top "Separate" icon
No download filed offered from enquirer at this moment
Tap File icon to select files to share with Responsers. To remove items from the list,tap the check mark and Save before leave.
Contacting Enquirer to fetch a download list.
Requested file is no longer offered by Enquirer. This is the updated list
Please wait for complete of file transmission
Choose an application to open with

1. A responser will be added to this list automatically at the first-time response, whose permit will be default. Both can be modified using tapping 2. You may also add a responser by tapping the top + icon then tell the responser in person, who can enter pin in Setting menu 3. To delete a responser from the list, tap the check mark to uncheck, then tap top Save icon
Still listening. Stop listening before preview files
Without the permission of Saving Files from responsers, you can only receive text messages. Do you intend to grant the permission?
To delete records, tap the check mark on the tail, then Save
Tapping column header to sort table by the column
Language,Background Color,Foreground Color,Font Size,Data Folder,Upload Folder,Download Folder,Download-Serving Folder,Port Number
